XRSessionSqueeze_event.summary: The WebXR squeeze event is sent to an when one of the session's input sources has completed a primary squeeze action. Examples of common kinds of primary action are users pressing triggers or buttons, tapping a touchpad, speaking a command, or performing a recognizable gesture when using a video tracking system or handheld controller with an accelerometer.

remarks.para: For details on how the , squeeze, and events work, and how you should react to them, see Inputs and input sources.
